AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.heroSubtitle: Experienced software developer passionate about creating meaningful digital solutions.
aboutParagraph: I am a software developer with over 5 years of experience building modern web applications. I specialize in JavaScript, TypeScript, and the React ecosystem.
My approach combines analytical thinking with creativity to deliver solutions that are not only technically efficient but also provide an exceptional user experience.
Outside of coding, I enjoy contributing to open-source projects, writing technical articles, and continually learning new technologies.
AboutPage.experienceSubtitle: My career journey and challenging projects I have worked on
AboutPage.educationSubtitle: My academic background and professional certifications
AboutPage.ctaSubtitle: I’m always open to new opportunities and exciting collaborations. Let’s talk about your project!

experiences.description: Led a development team to build a SaaS platform serving over 10,000 active users.

education.description: Specialized in cloud computing and big data analytics.
Specialized in cloud computing and big data analytics.
